messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.

React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'baseColor', 'diffuse', 'glowColor', 'mapBrightness', 'mapSamples', 'markerColor', 'scale', and 'theta'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [baseColor, dark, diffuse, glowColor, mapBrightness, mapSamples, markerColor, scale, theta]

fix.text: [baseColor, dark, diffuse, glowColor, mapBrightness, mapSamples, markerColor, scale, theta]
